title: Beautifully designed, modern apartment in the heart of the finical dis
posting_body: ['Beautifully designed, modern apartment in the heart of the finical district!', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 1.0', 'Bathrooms: 1.0', 'Pets: Pets OK', 'Building Amenities', 'Doorman', 'Elevator', 'Health Club', 'Garage', 'Subway', 'Laundry', 'Bicycle Room', 'Storage', 'Lounge', 'Valet', 'Roof Deck', 'WiFi', 'Concierge', 'Live In Super', 'Apartment Amenities', 'Dishwasher', 'Hardwood', 'High Ceilings', 'Renovated', 'Marble Bath', 'Granite Kitchen', 'Light', 'Laundry In Unit', 'Microwave', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Open Kitchen', 'City View', 'Open View', 'this beautiful open kitchen style convertible one bedroom space will make you enjoy every second you spend in one of the most amazing apartment you will ever see in the finical district.', 'with its one of a kind cabinetry, stainless steal appliances open style kitchen, gratine countertops, marble bath, tons of closet space.', 'stripped hardwood flooring and knee to ceiling windows!', 'FLEX 3 apartment!', 'Amenities: Fitness center 24-hour door attendant Conference rooms Resident lounge Rooftop sundeck with grills Valet service Bike storage', 'Just a short walk from Battery Park, the East River Bike Trail, and numerous restaurants, residents enjoy life by Wall Street.', 'With convenient access to the Wall Street subway station, the FDR, and prime work and financial centers, the apartment puts the best of Manhattan at your doorstep.', 'Carlos Frias 407-731-5770', 'Carlos Frias', 'Phone: 4077315770', 'Mobile: 4077315770', 'Fax: (646) 893-2718', 'NY RENT OWN SELL \xa0 4077315770 \xa0 4077315770 \xa0 FAX (646) 893-2718', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Carlos Frias at 4077315770', '2721']
